attributes.action: Bring back capital punishment for child killers and paedophiles.
attributes.additional_details: The current sentences are not a deterrent.
attributes.background: To debate and have a open vote, if to bring back capital punishment for convicted paedophiles and child killers.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bring back the Death Penalty for child sexual abuse, rape and murder: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618680

Reintroduce Capital Punishment for Crimes Against Humanity: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607499
